Mizo: I hmun ah kal leh rawh

Bodo: नै ब' थां थामानि जोड़ मा?
Mizo: Pahnihte leh pathum dawng zat hi engzat nge?
He hmun zat hi chhut rawh
Sawm panga chanve zat chu eng nge?
Expression hi awlsam zawka siam rawh
Heng chemicals-te hi ngaihtuah takin pawl rawh
I hmu tawnna ziak la rawh

English: What are the parts of a cell?
Mizo: Cell kawng zawng chu eng nge?

English: The planet revolves around the sun
Mizo: Planet chu ni vel ah a vel
Hei hi chemical reaction a ni
Gravity hian thil chu a kawm hniam
Thing-te hian ni êng an mamawh

English: What is the capital of India?
Mizo: India khawpui ber chu eng nge?
Map kha ngaithla takin zir rawh
India hi engtikah nge zalenna a dawng?

English: Who was the first prime minister?
Mizo: Sorkar hruaitu hmasa ber chu tu nge?

English: Locate the river on the map

Mizo: Hei hi kan ram hla a ni
Kan ramri sava chu peacock a ni
Hei hi kum engzatah nge a thleng?
Hmun hrang hrang khawpui zir rawh

English: May I go to the bathroom?

Bodo: आं कलम ब'बाय लाफायनो हायो नोमा?

Mizo: Engtin nge hei hi kan chinfel?
He thu hian eng nge a awmzia?
Chuta i sawi leh thei em?

English: Can I work with a partner?
Bodo: आं जेरावसो लानो गोब थायनो हायो नोमा?
Mizo: Thiante nen ka thawk thei em?
Exam hi tunah a tan ta

Bodo: गासै हाबाफोर गिबिबो फोरनो पाठ थ

Mizo: Exam hun lai hian thu sawi suh

English: Keep your eyes on your paper
Mizo: I lehkhabu chu en zel rawh
I hre lo chuan skip rawh
Hei hi ka lehkhabu a ni
Chu chu i dap a ni
Nawn lehah sawi thei ang em
Khawi ah nang i kal mek
